channel.title: Need a hoster pm me
channel.description:
Need a hoster to host me and a friends server. We just aint able to host atm. We can code the server and all of that and we have a forums too. We wont need you for more then a week top's and then we will be getting a vps. Pm me on here if your interested and we can work something out.
Thanks, Froggg
P.S. Needs to be a 24/7 hoster but we can work all of that out. You wont have to do nothing but host for us and we will send you Fully written codes to replace the whole set of codes as we update server.

item.title: Need a hoster pm me
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Not allowed in this section. Maybe apply to be a hoster in the ‘development teams’ section in someone’s thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a hoster pm me
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

sorry bud under the rules requesting a hoster is not allowed anywhere on these forums. If you want ill try and help you or your friend portforward to get it online!

If you have skype add Oceannomic

Read full topic
